DOC.brief_title: Evaluation CarePartner-Integrated Telehealth Rehabilitation Program Persons With Stroke
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study identify potential benefit home-based , intervention design facilitate carepartners ' role stroke survivor rehabilitation . Stroke survivor caregiver participate pair . Stroke survivor receive constraint induce movement therapy ( CIMT ) . Caregivers stroke survivor randomize traditional caregiver education web base intervention duration stroke survivor therapy . A tablet provide participant access complete web base intervention . All participant ask complete questionnaire begin therapy , end therapy , one month post therapy .
DOC.criteria: Stroke Survivors Three month two year post ischemic hemorrhagic event Minimal moderate upper extremity deficit ( ability initiate wrist finger extension ) Minimental screen test score great 24 Presence care partner Caregivers At least 18 year old Stroke Survivors Severe cognitive deficit Ability read write English Minimental screen test score great 24 Caregivers Significant cognitive deficit
